title: Why Data Accuracy Matters in Decision-Making
content: Inaccurate data leads to poor business decisions. A single error can affect financial forecasts, project outcomes, and even reputation. Research analysts ensure data quality by validating sources, cross-checking results, and using automation tools for consistency. Remember: better data = better outcomess.
